 #    if defined (isfinite)

diff -aur STLport-5.2.1/src/_stdio_file.h STLport/src/_stdio_file.h
--- STLport-5.2.1/src/_stdio_file.h	2008-12-10 12:56:51.000000000 +0300
+++ STLport/src/_stdio_file.h	2013-03-22 19:46:52.287736680 +0400
@@ -102,6 +102,10 @@
 /* the prototypes are taken from LynxOS patch for STLport 4.0 */
 inline int _FILE_fd(const FILE *__f) { return __f->_fd; }
 
+#elif defined (__EMBOX__)
+
+inline int _FILE_fd(const FILE *__f) { return __f->fd; }
+
 #else  /* The most common access to file descriptor. */
 
 inline int _FILE_fd(const FILE *__f) { return __f->_file; }
